title: 5 shot during New Year's Eve party in Milan neighborhood
content:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) -
Five males ranging in age from 15 to 22 were shot during a New Year's Eve party Thursday night.
According to NOPD, the victims were standing in the 1900 block of Amelia Street just after 9 p.m. when multiple shooters pulled up in a car, got out and opened fire.
Police said all of the victims were taken to the hospital by private conveyance. All are listed in stable condition.
Anyone with information on this shooting is asked to call CRIMESTOPPERS at 504-822-1111.
